mapper.select: select process, to_char(process_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd [hh24:mi]') as processDate, username, address, book_title from history order by process_date desc
mapper.insert: insert into history ( process, process_date, username, address, book_title, book_id ) values ( #{process}, cast(#{processDate} as timestamp), #{username}, #{address}, #{bookTitle}, #{bookId})
